text: What do you mean by drag and drop field?
Please look at this SS
just add a file type field and style it accordingly
But in that I can only choose after clicking button I cannot drag and drop my file in that field
Its done Thankyou <@UV23JHEJY>

I've got a Marketing Email in HubSpot that I trigger from my backend. The email has a CTA with a link back to my frontend. I would like that when the user clicks that link, a UTM string gets appended to the URL (something like `my_url?source=HubSpot` ). How can I do this for this specific email?

I recently came across an issue where I have made multiple updates to a page, but the changes are not reflected on the website. I have cleared my cache and have verified the behavior in multiple browsers. I am not getting an error upon saving nor updating the page. I have, however, made a lot of changes and perhaps there is something I am unaware of that blocks updating the page. Thoughts?
are you using Firefox?
Edge and Chrome
do you have Extensions / Addons installed that do prevent tracking?
Not that I am aware of
have you tried it in Incognito?
Yes. It shows my changes in the Webpage editor, and I can go through the process of updating without any error in multiple browsers. However, it is like it is delayed in publishing it.
Are you testing it on a "HubSpotpagebuilder" domain? cause those test domains are quite bad when it comes to reflecting new changes immediately
<http://name-id.hs-sites.com|name-id.hs-sites.com> is the nomenclature ...does that relate to the "HubSpotpagebuilder"? I haven't had an issue with it until this morning
So funny. Even the thumbnail displays properly, but the actual page isn't up to date

No it's a different HubSpot domain, one check you can do is to inspect the page, go on the "network tab" and on the page request, take a look at the header "X-Hs-Prerendered" to see when the page has been pre-rendered the last time
If the page keep not updating you can try contacting HubSpot support, recently those kind of problems keep happening more frenquently than ever
I called support. As I was on the phone, it finally updated. I guess I needed to be patient.
Still, it took ~30 minutes

Install this extension if you are using a chrome browser
<https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/HubSpot-developer-extensi/gebemkdecnlgbcanplbgdpcffpdnfdfo>

<@U054N6FREDD> Sorry, Iâ€™ve only just seen this
I ended up disabling the global setting.
There was no other way around
